sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { UserIcon, AcademicCapIcon, ShoppingBagIcon, HeartIcon, CheckCircleIcon, ClockIcon, EyeIcon, ArrowDownTrayIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useCart } from '../contexts/CartContext'; const DashboardPage: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { items: cartItems } = useCart(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const tabs = [ { id: 'overview', name: 'Overview', icon: UserIcon }, { id: 'orders', name: 'My Orders', icon: ShoppingBagIcon }, { id: 'projects', name: 'My Projects', icon: AcademicCapIcon }, { id: 'profile', name: 'Profile', icon: UserIcon } ]; const renderOverview = () => (

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}! ðŸ‘‹

Here's what's happening with your academic projects

Total Orders

2

Completed

1

In Progress

1

{cartItems.length > 0 && (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length} items in cart

â‚¹{cartItems.reduce((sum: number, item: any) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0)}

)}
); const renderOrders = () => (

Order History

ORD-2024-001

Ordered on Jan 15, 2024

â‚¹2,999

completed
); const renderProfile = () => (

Profile Information

{user?.firstName} {user?.lastName}

{user?.email}

{user?.phone}

{user?.qualification}

{user?.domain}

{user?.college || 'Not specified'}

); const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return renderOverview(); case 'orders': return renderOrders(); case 'profile': return renderProfile(); default: return renderOverview(); } }; return (

Dashboard

Manage your projects, orders, and profile

{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{renderTabContent()}
); }; export default DashboardPage;
